summary: This mod aims to completely overhaul the ending style of Castle Volkihar to fix all the damage and redo nearly everything related to the castle
descriptionHtml:
[color=White][size=3]Name : [/size][/color]Castle Volkihar Overhaul
[color=White][size=3]Version : [/size][/color]V1.5
[color=White][size=3]Date : [/size][/color]08/21/12
[color=White][size=3]Category : [/size][/color]Buildings
[color=White][size=3]Author(s) : [/size][/color]Forzane
[color=White]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=White]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
DLC: Dawnguard is required for this mod to work
[color=White]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=White]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=White][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-------------------------[/color]
When I went to Castle Volkihar ..I was a bit disappointed at the condition of the Castle that a clan of Vampires have lived in for Centuries .. It would be a bit more upkept even under the rein of a Vampire Lord like Harkon..So this mod aims to Overhaul the whole Castle inside and Out of rubble and disrepair and plain disgusting looks.... AT THIS MOMENT THIS IS A wip

[color=White][size=4]Location:[/size][/color]
[color=White]----------------------[/color]
Castle Volkihar in DawnGuard DLC

[color=White][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=White]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=White][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=White]---------------------------------[/color]
Drop the ESP into your Skyrim Data Folder


[color=White][size=4]---Uninstallation:---[/size][/color]
[color=White]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=White][size=3]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-----------------------------------[/color]
Delete the ESP out of your Skyrim Data FOlder

[color=White][size=4]Known issues and bugs:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-----------------------------------[/color]
None
I have done my best to make this compatible with any of the quests in the Castle but if theres a bug please tell me

[color=White][size=4]Incompatabilities:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-------------------------------[/color]
as of right now i would say anything that messes with the Castle or the Vampire Cattle.

I have done my best to not make this incompatible with any of the quests in the Castle but if theres a bug please tell me

[color=White][size=4]Tools Used:[/size][/color]
[color=White]------------------------[/color]
[url=http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url]
[url=http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/]Photoshop[/url]
Creation Kit, Available on Steam

[color=White][size=4]Future Plans:[/size][/color]
[color=White]--------------------------[/color]
i have plans to overmake everything for the castle from the roof to the foundation...i also will be expanding the castle into new sections

[color=White][size=4]Legal and licensing:[/size][/color]
[color=White]---------------------------------[/color]
First ask for my permission.
author: Forzane
